뉴스제목: Dogecoin 600% Rally Prediction Still On Track Before End Of 2024 — Analyst
본문: As 2024 concludes, Dogecoin (DOGE) is attracting numerous investors and analysts who foresee a substantial price fluctuation for the meme coin. Analyst Javon Marks recently projected that DOGE will attain a target of $2.28 by year-end. This positive perspective is founded on a synthesis of market sentiment and technical analysis. Related Reading: Dogecoin Price Breaks Out Of Symmetrical Triangle Pattern, Analyst Puts Target Above $0.37 Short-Term Bullish Momentum The technical side shows good bullish momentum in the short and medium term for Dogecoin. There’s likely to be an approximate rise of 206% over the next three months with the current sentiment of the market. This is indicative of increased interest in DOGE because it continues to position itself as a potential investment vehicle. In the next six months, a more tempered but still significant growth of 51% is expected, according to CoinCheckup. That means that the upward trend in Dogecoin can persist at a healthy rate. Bull Market Patterns The Fibonacci expansion analysis shows Dogecoin’s bull market patterns, which fuels Javon Marks’ forecast. DOGE rose from $0.00009 to $0.00748, matching the 1.618 Fibonacci level in 2015–2017. The 2020–2021 cycle saw it rise from $0.00168 to $0.73, surpassing the 1.618 Fibonacci level at $0.03912. $DOGE (Dogecoin) Update: The history hasn’t changed and still points to a fairly high likeliness of a price run to AND ABOVE the 1.618 Fib Extension level as it did every cycle prior to this and this time around, that’d result in a more than 570% increase from here to $2.28+! https://t.co/BtYB3vaWHH pic.twitter.com/Fdvqb7FtCW — JAVON⚡️MARKS (@JavonTM1) December 25, 2024 Even though the price has dropped about 46% since its high point of $0.48, people are still generally hopeful. A lot of people think that DOGE could easily break through barrier levels and go to higher levels if the market as a whole is in a good mood. At the time of writing, the price of DOGE is around $0.3227. If Marks’ prediction holds true, then DOGE would have risen by 606% by the end of 2024. Dogecoin (DOGE) prices have gone up and down a lot in the past. In 2017, the coin started a parabolic rise that saw it rise by 200% and then drop by 40%. After that, it went up by an insane 5,000%. DOGE went through a similar trend in 2021. It went up 476%, then down 56%, and then up to 120%. Medium To Long-Term Predictions Looking forward to the one-year mark, the projections are still quite conservative at 24%, which will probably indicate stabilization after the initial growth. Although the short-term prospects for Dogecoin are extremely bullish, medium- and long-term gains might moderate with the change of market conditions. Related Reading: Moo Deng Crypto Climbs 70% On News Of Buterin’s Baby Hippo Adoption Other analysts are even predicting Dogecoin to reach $1 or $4 in the next few years, besides Marks’ predictions. In short, the convergence of political development, technical factors, and social sentiment has created a unique environment for growth. With DOGE gaining more ground as a payment method for many businesses, its utility in the cryptocurrency ecosystem will also grow. Featured image from TechRadar, chart from TradingView

뉴스제목: Ripple (XRP) News: Expert Suggests XRP Could Rally 700%, Fantom Goes Live With Sonic Protocol, As Investors Rush To Yeti Ouro Presale To Join Meme Contest
본문: The post Ripple (XRP) News: Expert Suggests XRP Could Rally 700%, Fantom Goes Live With Sonic Protocol, As Investors Rush To Yeti Ouro Presale To Join Meme Contest appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Despite a dip in the overall market cap over the past week, experts still believe the market has more to offer as we head into 2025. Some have predicted that Ripple (XRP) could be the best investment, as they predict a 700% rise over the next few months. Others are looking beyond the top coins, with Fantom and the new MemeFi altcoin Yeti Ouro (YETIO) among the standouts. XRP Price To Surge 700% XRP has been on a stellar run since late November and has been the highest gainer among the top 10 coins in the market, nearly quadrupling its value over the past four months. Analysts expect the token to break out after a three-week consolidation in December, with the short-term target of XRP price being set at $3.5. After this, the token will embark on a run that experts believe will yield over 700% in returns. (Image courtesy of Bark Meta ). Investors are also eyeing Fantom after the recent launch of the Sonic mainnet, an EVM-compatible high-throughput layer 1 blockchain network that promises to change the game. Sonic promises over 10,000 transactions per second, with finality achieved in less than a second. While FTM has shed nearly 30% in the past week, Sonic’s launch could revitalize the token ahead of the New Year. Analysts note that it must break above $1.1 in the short term to surge over the first few weeks of 2025. Investors Rush To Yeti Ouro Meme Contest Meanwhile, Yeti Ouro has become one of the most talked-about crypto projects in recent days, following the success of its presale and a new meme contest that’s generating buzz on social media platforms. Meanwhile, the Yeti Ouro meme contest has wrapped up, with some of the participants sharing their innovative creations – https://x.com/nayansingh08/status/1871866750641532951?s=10 The project is in the second stage of its presale, where investors have already purchased over 10 million tokens, raising $179,000. In the previous stage, the project sold out all its allocated tokens and raised $1.2 million in a few weeks. Yeti Ouro sets itself apart from most projects by focusing on utility rather than hype, speculation and quick gains. The project, deployed on Ethereum, is built around Yeti Go, a thrilling play-to-earn game in which players are rewarded with YETIO tokens for winning their races. Yeti Go was developed by avid gamers in partnership with the studios behind Call of Duty, The Witcher 3, Spider-Man and other iconic global successes. It is built with Epic Games’ Unreal Engine, which makes it engaging and immersive. To win, players must dodge hazards, obstacles and attacks from other players. They can also attack opponents using weapons purchased with YETIO. Additionally, they can stake the tokens to unlock exclusive rewards. Join the Yeti Ouro Community Website: https://yetiouro.io/ X (Formerly Twitter): https://x.com/yetiouro Telegram: https://t.me/yetiouroofficial Discord: https://discord.gg/YtUsEZ2ZrV

뉴스제목: U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETFs See $475.15 Million in Net Inflows on December 26
본문: U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETFs See $475.15 Million in Net Inflows on December 26 U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs experienced a combined net inflow of $475.15 million on December 26, reflecting growing investor confidence in the cryptocurrency market. According to data from Trader T (@thepfund) on X, leading ETFs from Fidelity, ARK Invest, and BlackRock drove the bulk of the inflows, signaling sustained institutional interest in Bitcoin. Breakdown of Net Inflows 1. Fidelity’s FBTC Takes the Lead Fidelity’s FBTC ETF saw the largest net inflow at $254.37 million , cementing its position as a preferred vehicle for Bitcoin exposure. Fidelity’s strong brand reputation and wide investor base likely contributed to this significant influx. 2. ARK Invest’s ARKB Gains $186.94 Million ARK Invest’s ARKB ETF recorded an impressive $186.94 million in inflows. Cathie Wood’s continued bullish outlook on Bitcoin may have bolstered investor confidence in this ETF. 3. BlackRock’s IBIT Adds $56.50 Million BlackRock’s IBIT ETF brought in $56.50 million , reflecting steady demand from institutional clients leveraging BlackRock’s vast resources and expertise. 4. Grayscale’s BTC and VanEck’s HODL Grayscale’s BTC ETF attracted $7.19 million , while VanEck’s HODL ETF added $2.7 million , showing moderate interest in these funds. Net Outflows in Other Funds Grayscale’s GBTC : Reported outflows of $24.23 million , likely due to investors transitioning to spot ETFs from its trust structure. Bitwise’s BITB : Saw $8.32 million in outflows, reflecting competitive pressure in the growing ETF market. Other ETFs reported no significant inflows or outflows for the day. Why Spot Bitcoin ETFs Matter Spot Bitcoin ETFs allow investors to gain direct exposure to Bitcoin’s price movements through regulated investment vehicles, without the need to hold the underlying asset. Key Benefits Regulatory Oversight : Operate within the framework of U.S. securities regulations, ensuring transparency and investor protection. Accessibility : Provide an easier entry point for both retail and institutional investors compared to direct Bitcoin holdings. Market Legitimization : Signal broader acceptance of Bitcoin as a mainstream financial asset. Market Implications of the Inflows The substantial inflows into U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs highlight several key trends and implications: 1. Institutional Confidence The dominance of Fidelity, ARK Invest, and BlackRock in the inflows underscores the growing trust in Bitcoin as a long-term investment among institutional players. 2. Investor Diversification The variety of ETFs attracting inflows indicates that investors are diversifying their exposure across multiple products, spreading risk while leveraging each fund’s unique strengths. 3. Shift from GBTC to Spot ETFs Grayscale’s GBTC trust continues to see outflows as investors move toward the more efficient and regulated spot ETFs. Comparative Performance of Leading ETFs ETF Net Inflows (Dec. 26) Market Share Fidelity FBTC $254.37M 53.5% ARK Invest ARKB $186.94M 39.3% BlackRock IBIT $56.50M 11.9% Grayscale BTC $7.19M 1.5% VanEck HODL $2.7M 0.6% The concentration of inflows in Fidelity and ARK Invest’s ETFs highlights their dominant market position and investor appeal. What’s Driving These Inflows? 1. Growing Bitcoin Adoption The increasing adoption of Bitcoin by institutions and individuals alike is driving demand for accessible investment options like spot ETFs. 2. Favorable Market Conditions Bitcoin’s resilience in 2024 has attracted renewed interest from investors seeking alternative assets. Reduced market volatility and consistent capital inflows support bullish sentiment. 3. Regulatory Clarity The approval and success of U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs reflect a more mature regulatory environment, giving investors confidence in these products. Challenges and Risks Despite the bullish inflows, there are challenges and risks to consider: Market Volatility : Bitcoin’s price movements remain unpredictable, potentially impacting ETF performance. Regulatory Changes : Future regulatory actions could alter the landscape for Bitcoin ETFs. Competition : As more ETFs enter the market, existing products must differentiate themselves to maintain inflows. Conclusion The $475.15 million net inflows into U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs on December 26 mark a significant milestone, showcasing growing investor confidence in Bitcoin’s potential as a mainstream asset. Fidelity’s FBTC and ARK Invest’s ARKB led the charge, reflecting their appeal among both retail and institutional investors. As the market for Bitcoin ETFs continues to grow, the inflows highlight the importance of these products in broadening access to Bitcoin and driving its adoption within the financial system. Investors will be watching closely as this trend evolves, signaling the continued integration of cryptocurrencies into traditional finance. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news , where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

뉴스제목: Crypto May Face Less Favorable Macro Conditions in 2025, Citi Warns
본문: Crypto May Face Less Favorable Macro Conditions in 2025, Citi Warns Cryptocurrencies may encounter a challenging macroeconomic environment in 2025, according to a new report from Citigroup . Analysts have outlined six critical factors that could determine the success or failure of the digital asset market, emphasizing the importance of macroeconomic stability, ETF inflows, and regulatory developments . While the first quarter of 2025 is expected to support cryptocurrencies as risk assets, Citi warns of growing uncertainty due to potential policy shifts and increased market volatility later in the year. Six Key Factors for Crypto’s Success in 2025 Citi analysts identified the following factors as pivotal for the cryptocurrency market in 2025: 1. Supportive Macro Backdrop A favorable macroeconomic environment—marked by stable interest rates and inflation—could encourage risk-taking and drive capital into cryptocurrencies. However, Citi warns that U.S. policy shifts and global market volatility might disrupt this stability beyond Q1 2025. 2. Inflows into Spot ETFs Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs have been significant market drivers in 2024, and continued inflows will be crucial for maintaining liquidity and investor interest. Citi analysts predict that crypto ETFs will remain a dominant force, especially as institutional adoption grows. 3. Integration into Multi-Asset Portfolios For institutions to increase their cryptocurrency allocations, crypto returns must consistently outperform equities and offer diversification benefits. Broader portfolio integration could enhance crypto’s appeal to traditional investors. 4. Stablecoin Issuance Stablecoins are expected to play a pivotal role in the DeFi ecosystem , offering liquidity and stability in an otherwise volatile market. Growth in stablecoin issuance may signal greater adoption of blockchain-based financial systems. 5. Regulatory Developments Regulatory clarity remains critical for institutional adoption. Citi highlights the need for balanced policies that promote innovation while addressing risks like fraud and market manipulation. 6. Economic Uncertainty Uncertainty tied to stock market volatility and global economic conditions could push investors toward or away from cryptocurrencies, depending on the perceived risks and opportunities. Macroeconomic Outlook for 2025 Short-Term Optimism Citi analysts suggest that Q1 2025 may be favorable for cryptocurrencies, with a stable macro backdrop supporting risk assets. Key factors include: Moderation in interest rate hikes by central banks. Improved investor sentiment amid economic stabilization. Long-Term Concerns Beyond Q1, Citi warns of potential headwinds: U.S. Policy Shifts : Changes in fiscal or monetary policy could disrupt market stability. Market Volatility : Increased turbulence in equity and bond markets may spill over into crypto. Spot ETFs and Institutional Adoption Spot cryptocurrency ETFs, particularly in the U.S., have emerged as a game-changing development, attracting billions in inflows. ETF Inflows as a Growth Driver Continued capital inflows into Bitcoin and Ethereum spot ETFs are expected to bolster market liquidity and confidence. These products provide regulated exposure to crypto assets, making them accessible to a broader range of investors. Institutional Adoption Challenges For institutions to deepen their crypto investments, the asset class must consistently deliver higher risk-adjusted returns than traditional equities. Citi emphasizes the importance of integrating crypto into multi-asset portfolios to enhance diversification and returns. Stablecoins and DeFi: A Bright Spot Stablecoins remain a cornerstone of the cryptocurrency ecosystem, particularly in DeFi applications : Role in the Market Provide liquidity and act as a bridge between traditional and digital finance. Enable seamless transactions and minimize volatility risk for DeFi participants. Growth Potential Citi analysts expect stablecoins to continue leading DeFi innovation, with increased issuance signaling adoption in emerging markets and cross-border payments. Challenges Ahead Despite positive trends, Citi’s report underscores several challenges that could hinder crypto’s growth in 2025: 1. Regulatory Headwinds Stricter regulations or uncertainty could slow adoption, particularly among institutions. Balancing innovation with consumer protection remains a delicate task for policymakers. 2. Competition with Equities Cryptocurrencies must outperform traditional assets to attract institutional interest, particularly during periods of economic stability. 3. Market Volatility While volatility attracts traders, it deters long-term investors seeking stability and predictable returns. Conclusion Citigroup’s analysis highlights a mixed outlook for cryptocurrencies in 2025. While the first quarter may present favorable conditions for growth, uncertainty looms in the latter part of the year, driven by potential policy shifts, market volatility, and regulatory challenges . Nevertheless, spot ETFs, stablecoins, and DeFi remain promising areas of development, offering opportunities for adoption and innovation. As crypto continues to evolve, its ability to navigate macroeconomic and regulatory challenges will determine its long-term success. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news, where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

뉴스제목: Bybit Web3 Wallet Integrates Tonstakers: The First of Its TON Staking Offerings to Expand DeFi Opportunities
본문: DUBAI, UAE, Dec. 27, 2024 /PRNewswire/ – Bybit , the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency exchange, is excited to announce the integration of Tonstakers , the leading liquid staking protocol on the TON blockchain, into its Web3 Wallet. This marks the first of Bybit Web3’s TON staking offerings, reinforcing its commitment to expanding decentralized finance (DeFi) opportunities for its users. With this integration, Bybit Web3 Wallet users can now seamlessly stake Toncoin ($TON) and receive $tsTON (Tonstakers LST) in return. The value of $tsTON increases relative to $TON every 26 hours, ensuring competitive rewards while contributing to the growth and success of the TON ecosystem. The integration also opens the door for 130 million users in the TON ecosystem to access TON staking directly within the Bybit Web3 Wallet. Bybit is dedicated to simplifying DeFi adoption by providing intuitive and user-friendly staking experiences. This milestone partnership with Tonstakers enables users to unlock annual returns estimated between 3% and 5% APY, with rewards automatically compounded, further cementing Bybit’s role as a leader in DeFi accessibility. Why Tonstakers Matters: The First of Its Kind Tonstakers is the inaugural partner in Bybit Web3’s TON staking initiative, setting a new standard for staking services. With a total value locked (TVL) exceeding $260 million and a significant market share in the liquid-staked TON sector, Tonstakers offers Bybit Web3 Wallet users unparalleled access to TON staking benefits: Effortless Staking : Securely staking $TON with ease, thanks to the user-friendly interface within the Bybit Web3 Wallet. Earning $tsTON Rewards : Receiving tokenized staked Toncoin ($tsTON), which can be leveraged within DeFi applications across the TON ecosystem. Exploring DeFi Liquidity : Engaging with Tonstakers Earn to provide liquidity using $tsTON, unlocking diverse earning opportunities. “Bybit Web3 is proud to deepen our integration with the TON blockchain, a crucial step in our mission to foster a thriving and interconnected Web3 ecosystem,” said Emily Bao, Head of Bybit Web3. “This integration empowers our users with seamless and trusted access to TON liquid staking pools and unlocks valuable earning opportunities. As a strong believer in DeFi adoption, Bybit Web3 is committed to bridging the gap between Web2 and Web3, creating simple, easy, and accessible solutions that bring the benefits of decentralized finance to a wider audience. We believe this integration will significantly contribute to the growth and success of the TON ecosystem.” Starting Staking Today To begin staking $TON and earning with $tsTON, users can visit https://www.bybit.com/en/web3/staking and discover the power of Bybit Web3 Wallet’s integration with Tonstakers. Bybit Web3 Wallet currently supports a wide range of staking services beyond TON tokens, including ETH, USDT, USDC, bbSOL, SUI, and more. #Bybit / #TheCryptoArk / #BybitWeb3 About Bybit Web3 Bybit Web3 is redefining openness in the decentralized world, creating a simpler, open, and equal ecosystem for everyone. We are committed to welcoming builders, creators, and partners in the blockchain space, extending an invitation to both crypto enthusiasts and the curious, with a community of over 130 million wallet addresses across over 30 major ecosystem partners, and counting. Bybit Web3 provides a comprehensive suite of Web3 products designed to make accessing, swapping, collecting and growing Web3 assets as open and simple as possible. Our wallets, marketplaces and platforms are all backed by the security and expertise that define Bybit as the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, trusted by over 60 million users globally. Join the revolution now and open the door to your Web3 future with Bybit. For more details about Bybit Web3, users can visit Bybit Web3. About Bybit Bybit is the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, serving a global community of over 60 million users. Founded in 2018, Bybit is redefining openness in the decentralized world by creating a simpler, open, and equal ecosystem for everyone. With a strong focus on Web3, Bybit partners strategically with leading blockchain protocols to provide robust infrastructure and drive on-chain innovation. Renowned for its secure custody, diverse marketplaces, intuitive user experience, and advanced blockchain tools, Bybit bridges the gap between TradFi and DeFi, empowering builders, creators, and enthusiasts to unlock the full potential of Web3. Discover the future of decentralized finance at Bybit.com . For more details about Bybit, please visit Bybit Press For media inquiries, please contact: media@bybit.com For updates, please follow: Bybit’s Communities and Social Media Discord | Facebook | Instagram | LinkedIn | Reddit | Telegram | TikTok | X | Youtube

뉴스제목: PeckShield Issues Scam Alert for SquidGame Token on Base Network
본문: PeckShield Issues Scam Alert for SquidGame Token on Base Network Blockchain security firm PeckShield has issued a scam alert for a fraudulent SquidGame token deployed on Coinbase’s layer-2 network Base . The token, launched just three hours ago, has already lost 99% of its value, with the deployer retaining the largest share. PeckShield’s warning serves as a crucial reminder for investors to exercise caution when dealing with newly launched tokens, particularly those lacking transparency. What Is the SquidGame Token Scam? The SquidGame token scam mirrors tactics used in previous fraudulent schemes, where deceptive marketing and a familiar theme lure unsuspecting investors. Key Details Identified by PeckShield Deployed on Base Network The token was launched on Coinbase’s layer-2 network, Base , a popular platform known for low fees and scalability. The use of Base may have lent an air of legitimacy to the project, deceiving investors. Deployer Holds the Majority The token’s deployer retains the largest share, enabling them to manipulate the market. Such practices often lead to rug pull scenarios , where the deployer dumps their holdings, crashing the token’s value. 99% Value Drop Within hours of launch, the token’s value plummeted by 99% , leaving investors with significant losses. How Scammers Exploit New Investors Scammers often capitalize on popular themes or trends to create tokens that appear legitimate but are designed to defraud investors. Tactics Used in the SquidGame Token Scam Name Recognition : Leveraging the popularity of “Squid Game,” a widely recognized franchise, to attract attention. Fake Hype : Generating artificial excitement through social media and online forums. Low Transparency : Deploying tokens with unclear ownership, governance, or utility. Protecting Yourself from Token Scams To avoid falling victim to scams like the SquidGame token, investors should adopt the following practices: 1. Research Before Investing Verify the project’s website, team, and whitepaper. Look for audits or reviews from reputable blockchain security firms like PeckShield. 2. Check Ownership Distribution Avoid tokens where a single entity holds a disproportionate share. Use blockchain explorers to analyze wallet distributions. 3. Monitor Community Feedback Engage with the project’s community to gauge sentiment and transparency. Be wary of overly positive or scripted reviews. 4. Beware of Unrealistic Promises Avoid projects offering guaranteed returns or making bold, unsupported claims. Why Base Network Is a Target The Base network , built by Coinbase, has gained popularity for its low fees and developer-friendly environment. However, its rise has also made it a target for malicious actors: Low Deployment Costs : Scammers can deploy tokens at minimal expense, increasing the frequency of fraudulent schemes. Growing User Base : The network’s popularity attracts both legitimate projects and opportunistic scammers. While Base offers robust infrastructure, users must remain vigilant and rely on trusted security measures. Previous Scam Trends and Lessons Learned The SquidGame token scam is not the first instance of fraudulent tokens exploiting popular culture. Scam Token Key Tactic Outcome Squid Game Token (2021) Capitalized on Netflix series fame Rug pull after price surge Elder Scrolls Token Used gaming franchise branding Immediate value crash Meta Coin Mimicked Facebook rebranding Regulatory crackdown These examples highlight the recurring patterns of crypto scams and the need for investor awareness. What’s Next for the SquidGame Token? PeckShield’s timely alert has likely mitigated further losses for potential investors. However, the incident raises broader concerns: Increased Scrutiny : Platforms like Base and Coinbase may face pressure to enhance monitoring for fraudulent token launches. Community Education : Greater emphasis on educating investors about identifying and avoiding scams is essential. Regulatory Attention : Authorities may accelerate efforts to regulate token launches and enforce stricter standards. Conclusion The SquidGame token scam on Base underscores the persistent risks in the cryptocurrency market. PeckShield’s alert highlights the importance of vigilance and due diligence in protecting oneself from fraudulent schemes. As the crypto ecosystem evolves, both investors and platforms must prioritize security and transparency to foster trust and prevent similar incidents. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news, where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

뉴스제목: Crypto Analyst Suggests Bitcoin Could Retest $100K: Key Indicators Point to Bullish Momentum
본문: Crypto Analyst Suggests Bitcoin Could Retest $100K: Key Indicators Point to Bullish Momentum Bitcoin (BTC) may be gearing up for a retest of the $100,000 psychological resistance level by the end of 2024, according to an analysis shared by Cointelegraph . Citing insights from CryptoQuant contributor Burrakesmeci , the analysis points to rising Taker Buy Volume on Binance as a key indicator of growing demand and potential upward momentum. What Is Taker Buy Volume? Taker Buy Volume measures the total value of buy transactions executed by market takers—traders who place market orders that match existing limit orders on the exchange. Why It Matters Trend Indicator : Higher Taker Buy Volume suggests increased demand for Bitcoin, often signaling bullish sentiment. Market Confidence : Consistently rising buy volume indicates that investors are willing to pay the market price, a strong signal of confidence. Rising Taker Buy Volume on Binance Higher Lows Signal Upward Momentum Since October 28 , Taker Buy Volume on Binance has been establishing higher lows, reflecting sustained buying interest. Key milestones include: December 1 : Volume dipped below $5 billion . December 15 : Hovered just under $6 billion . December 25 : Surpassed $6 billion , reinforcing the upward trend. What Three Higher Lows Mean Technical analysts often interpret three consecutive higher lows as a sign of an emerging bullish trend. This pattern aligns with the broader market anticipation of Bitcoin revisiting the $100,000 mark. Bitcoin’s Path to $100K: Factors at Play 1. Market Sentiment and Psychological Resistance $100,000 is a significant psychological barrier, often acting as a magnet for traders aiming to capitalize on major price milestones. Positive sentiment driven by institutional adoption and increased ETF inflows could push BTC closer to this level. 2. Binance Data as a Bellwether As one of the world’s largest crypto exchanges, Binance’s trading metrics, such as Taker Buy Volume, offer a reliable snapshot of market trends. Rising buy activity indicates robust demand, suggesting that investors expect further price appreciation. 3. Macro and Fundamental Drivers Spot Bitcoin ETFs : Continued inflows into ETFs have brought fresh capital to the market. Halving Event : The upcoming Bitcoin halving in 2024 is expected to reduce supply, historically a bullish catalyst. Institutional Interest : Companies and funds increasingly view Bitcoin as a hedge against macroeconomic instability. Potential Risks and Corrections While the rising Taker Buy Volume points to bullish potential, Burrakesmeci warns that the market may be overheated: 1. Short-Term Corrections Bitcoin’s volatile nature often results in sharp pullbacks, even during bullish trends. Corrections are common near key resistance levels like $100,000, as traders take profits. 2. Macro Uncertainty Global economic conditions, including interest rate decisions and regulatory changes, could impact Bitcoin’s trajectory. 3. Overleveraged Positions Excessive leverage in the market may lead to liquidations, amplifying downward pressure during corrections. Historical Context: Bitcoin’s Previous Milestones Bitcoin has approached key psychological levels in past bull cycles, often requiring multiple attempts to break through resistance: Cycle Year Key Resistance Level Outcome 2017 $20,000 Reached milestone but corrected sharply. 2021 $64,000 Surpassed resistance but faced volatility. 2024 $100,000 (predicted) Pending test of psychological barrier. Analyst’s Outlook for 2024 Burrakesmeci remains optimistic about Bitcoin’s potential to retest $100,000, citing the following indicators: Sustained Buy Demand : Rising Taker Buy Volume is a strong bullish signal. Market Resilience : Despite corrections, Bitcoin has shown the ability to recover and build momentum. However, the analyst emphasizes the importance of closely monitoring trading activity and macroeconomic trends as the year progresses. Conclusion Bitcoin’s rising Taker Buy Volume on Binance suggests a potential retest of the $100,000 level by the end of 2024, marking a major milestone in its adoption and market performance. While short-term corrections and macro uncertainties could pose challenges, the overall trend remains positive, supported by growing institutional interest and strong demand signals. For investors, aligning with these market indicators and maintaining a balanced strategy could provide opportunities to capitalize on Bitcoin’s next major price move. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news , where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

뉴스제목: Ethiopia Earns $1 Billion from Bitcoin Mining with Hydropower in 2024
본문: Ethiopia Earns $1 Billion from Bitcoin Mining with Hydropower in 2024 Ethiopia has emerged as a surprising player in the cryptocurrency space, earning $1 billion in Bitcoin mining revenue in 2024. This achievement was made possible by harnessing excess electricity generated by the Grand Renaissance Dam , a massive hydropower project. According to Bitcoin News , Bitcoin mining now accounts for 18% of Ethiopia’s electricity revenue , showcasing the potential for sustainable energy to power economic growth in Africa. How Ethiopia’s Bitcoin Mining Initiative Works 1. Utilizing Excess Hydropower The Grand Renaissance Dam, one of Africa’s largest hydropower projects, produces more electricity than Ethiopia currently consumes. Instead of letting this excess energy go to waste, the Ethiopian government has redirected it to power Bitcoin mining operations . 2. Global Investment Attraction The availability of low-cost, sustainable energy has attracted global investors to Ethiopia’s mining sector, boosting infrastructure development and foreign investment. 3. Government Support In February 2024 , the Ethiopian government signed agreements to supply electricity for Bitcoin mining, integrating cryptocurrency production into its broader economic strategy. Economic Impact of Bitcoin Mining in Ethiopia Ethiopia’s foray into Bitcoin mining has had significant implications for its economy: 1. Revenue Generation $1 Billion in Revenue : Mining operations have added a substantial revenue stream to Ethiopia’s economy, accounting for nearly one-fifth of its electricity revenue . Global Recognition : The initiative has placed Ethiopia on the map as an emerging player in the crypto and renewable energy sectors. 2. Energy Optimization Efficient Resource Use : By leveraging unused hydropower, Ethiopia has optimized its energy output while reducing waste. 3. Employment Opportunities The mining operations have created jobs in technology, logistics, and energy management, contributing to local economic development. Sustainable Energy Meets Cryptocurrency Ethiopia’s success highlights the synergy between sustainable energy and cryptocurrency mining: 1. Environmentally Friendly Mining Bitcoin mining often faces criticism for its high energy consumption. By using hydropower, Ethiopia offers a model for green mining practices . 2. Unlocking Africa’s Energy Potential Many African countries have untapped renewable energy resources. Ethiopia’s approach demonstrates how these resources can be monetized through innovative technologies like cryptocurrency mining. 3. Diversification of Revenue Streams By entering the cryptocurrency space, Ethiopia has diversified its economy, reducing reliance on traditional sectors like agriculture. Challenges and Risks Despite its success, Ethiopia’s Bitcoin mining initiative faces several challenges: 1. Regulatory Scrutiny As cryptocurrency adoption grows, regulatory frameworks may need to be strengthened to address concerns about transparency and governance. 2. Infrastructure Development Scaling mining operations requires significant investments in infrastructure, including cooling systems and network connectivity. 3. Market Volatility The profitability of Bitcoin mining is tied to cryptocurrency prices, exposing Ethiopia to market risks. Lessons for Other Nations Ethiopia’s Bitcoin mining strategy offers valuable insights for other countries, especially those with surplus renewable energy: Maximizing Resource Utilization : Countries with excess energy can emulate Ethiopia’s model to create new revenue streams. Fostering Innovation : Combining sustainable energy with blockchain technology can drive economic transformation. Engaging Global Investors : Ethiopia’s success demonstrates how strategic initiatives can attract foreign investment and expertise. Conclusion Ethiopia’s $1 billion Bitcoin mining milestone underscores the transformative potential of combining sustainable energy with innovative technology . By leveraging the Grand Renaissance Dam’s hydropower, Ethiopia has positioned itself as a leader in green cryptocurrency mining , offering a blueprint for other nations to follow. As the country continues to refine its approach and scale operations, Ethiopia’s journey highlights the vast opportunities at the intersection of renewable energy and the digital economy . To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news , where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

뉴스제목: $14.3 Billion in Bitcoin Options to Expire on December 27: What It Means for the Crypto Market
본문: $14.3 Billion in Bitcoin Options to Expire on December 27: What It Means for the Crypto Market The cryptocurrency market is bracing for a major financial event as $14.3 billion worth of Bitcoin options are set to expire at 08:00 UTC on December 27, 2024. This massive options expiration is accompanied by the maturation of $3.75 billion in Ethereum (ETH) options, signaling a pivotal day for traders and market observers. The put/call ratio for Bitcoin options is reported at 0.69, with a max pain price of $85,000, according to Deribit, a leading crypto options exchange. For Ethereum, the put/call ratio stands at 0.41, with a max pain price of $3,000. These metrics offer crucial insights into market sentiment and potential price movements, providing traders with an opportunity to assess risk and strategy as the expiration approaches. Understanding Bitcoin Options Expiration Bitcoin options are derivative contracts that grant traders the right, but not the obligation, to buy or sell BTC at a predetermined price before the contract expires. The expiration of options often leads to increased market volatility, as traders seek to adjust their positions. The put/call ratio —calculated by dividing the number of put options by call options—indicates the market’s sentiment. A ratio below 1, as observed with both Bitcoin (0.69) and Ethereum (0.41), suggests a bullish outlook. Meanwhile, the max pain price —the price point where the most options contracts expire worthless—provides insight into market manipulation strategies and trader losses. Bitcoin’s Max Pain Price: $85,000 The max pain price of $85,000 for Bitcoin reflects a significant point of interest for traders. This value represents the price at which the largest number of options contracts will expire worthless, leading to potential financial losses for traders. For Bitcoin to reach this max pain price, market activity and sentiment would need to align significantly, possibly triggering volatility in the hours leading up to expiration. Market participants will likely monitor price trends closely as this event unfolds. Traders positioned for either side of the options contracts—whether bullish or bearish—could see considerable gains or losses depending on the settlement price. Ethereum’s Max Pain Price: $3,000 Ethereum’s options market will also witness a substantial expiration on the same day, with $3.75 billion worth of contracts maturing. The max pain price of $3,000 reflects similar market dynamics. Although Ethereum’s market size is smaller than Bitcoin’s, the impact of its options expiration could still ripple across the broader cryptocurrency space. Impact on the Crypto Market The expiration of such a large volume of options often contributes to heightened volatility in the crypto market. With billions of dollars at stake, the event has implications for liquidity, market sentiment, and trading strategies. Liquidity Impact : Expirations often lead to increased liquidity as traders close out positions or roll contracts forward. Market Sentiment : The put/call ratios suggest a bullish sentiment for both Bitcoin and Ethereum, potentially pushing prices higher. Price Movements : The possibility of price manipulation around the max pain price is a concern, as large holders could influence market direction. What to Watch For Price Volatility : Expect sharp movements in Bitcoin and Ethereum prices as the expiration approaches. Volume Spikes : Watch for increased trading volume, signaling heightened activity. Market Trends : Pay attention to whether prices gravitate toward or diverge from the max pain levels. Conclusion The expiration of $14.3 billion in Bitcoin options, along with $3.75 billion in Ethereum options, marks a significant event in the cryptocurrency market. With key metrics such as the max pain price and put/call ratio signaling market sentiment, traders and investors should brace for potential volatility and strategic opportunities. As the market navigates this crucial day, participants must stay informed and prepared for the possible outcomes of these options expirations. Whether Bitcoin hovers near its $85,000 max pain price or deviates significantly, this event underscores the dynamic and often unpredictable nature of the crypto market. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news , where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

뉴스제목: MIRA Meme Coin Reaches $80 Million Market Cap, Supporting Rare Brain Tumor Research
본문: MIRA Meme Coin Reaches $80 Million Market Cap, Supporting Rare Brain Tumor Research The cryptocurrency community has witnessed the rise of a unique project, as the MIRA meme coin —a digital token created to support research on rare brain tumors in children—has reached an $80 million market capitalization. This milestone highlights the growing intersection of crypto innovation and philanthropic efforts, with MIRA emerging as a beacon of hope for families affected by rare diseases. The Story Behind MIRA Meme Coin The creation of MIRA meme coin was sparked by a heartfelt appeal from Siqi Chen, the CEO of a tech company, whose young daughter Mira was diagnosed with a rare brain tumor. Turning to the platform X (formerly Twitter), Chen called for donations to fund research into the disease. In an extraordinary act of solidarity, a user on Pump.fun, a platform dedicated to meme coins, created MIRA, a token designed to generate support and awareness for the cause. Soon after, an anonymous X user purchased 50% of the total supply of MIRA and transferred it to a project wallet under Chen’s control. This move transformed the meme coin from a niche initiative into a powerful tool for fundraising and advocacy. Reaching an $80 Million Market Cap As of December 27, 2024, the market capitalization of MIRA has reached $80 million. This remarkable growth is fueled by a combination of community-driven enthusiasm, philanthropic intent, and the broader appeal of meme coins in the crypto space. Siqi Chen has committed to liquidating $1,000 worth of MIRA tokens every 10 minutes, ensuring a steady flow of funds toward brain tumor research. This innovative approach demonstrates the potential of blockchain and cryptocurrencies to address real-world challenges through collective action. What Makes MIRA Unique? MIRA meme coin stands out in the crowded cryptocurrency market for several reasons: 1. A Philanthropic Mission Unlike most meme coins that thrive on humor or speculative trading, MIRA has a clear social purpose: supporting research on rare pediatric brain tumors. This mission has resonated deeply with the crypto community, driving widespread support. 2. Community-Driven Development The creation and subsequent success of MIRA underscore the power of community action. From its inception by a Pump.fun user to the large donation by an anonymous X user, MIRA’s journey reflects the decentralized and collaborative ethos of the blockchain space. 3. Sustainable Fundraising Through Chen’s planned liquidation strategy, MIRA ensures a consistent allocation of resources to its cause, balancing the volatility of crypto markets with the need for reliable funding. The Broader Impact of Meme Coins in Philanthropy The success of MIRA highlights a broader trend in the crypto industry: the use of meme coins for charitable causes. While meme coins have often been dismissed as speculative assets, projects like MIRA demonstrate their potential for meaningful impact. 1. Raising Awareness Meme coins have the power to reach a wide audience, leveraging humor, relatability, and virality to draw attention to important issues. 2. Mobilizing Communities Cryptocurrency communities are often highly engaged and action-oriented, making them ideal participants in philanthropic initiatives. 3. Innovating Fundraising Models Blockchain technology offers transparency and efficiency, ensuring that funds raised through meme coins are used for their intended purpose. Challenges and Opportunities While MIRA’s success is inspiring, it also highlights some challenges associated with combining cryptocurrencies and philanthropy: Volatility : Meme coins are notorious for price fluctuations, which could impact the stability of funds raised. Regulatory Scrutiny : As crypto projects grow in prominence, they may face increased regulatory oversight. Sustained Engagement : Maintaining long-term interest in a cause-driven meme coin requires ongoing community engagement and transparency. Despite these challenges, MIRA’s achievements demonstrate the immense opportunities for blockchain to drive social change. Conclusion The rise of the MIRA meme coin, with its $80 million market cap, showcases the transformative potential of cryptocurrencies in addressing real-world issues. Born out of a personal plea for help, MIRA has become a symbol of hope, innovation, and the power of community. As the crypto industry continues to evolve, projects like MIRA will likely inspire more initiatives that blend blockchain technology with philanthropy, proving that digital currencies can do more than just create wealth—they can create impact. 뉴스제목: Analyst Jacob King Labels Bitcoin ‘Utterly Useless’: A Deep Dive into His Controversial Critique
본문: Analyst Jacob King Labels Bitcoin ‘Utterly Useless’: A Deep Dive into His Controversial Critique Bitcoin, the world’s largest cryptocurrency, has faced its fair share of criticism since its inception. Recently, Jacob King, an analyst from the cryptocurrency newsletter Whalewire, added fuel to the debate by sharing his polarizing take on X (formerly Twitter). King described Bitcoin as “utterly useless,” labeling it a “malignant grift” that thrives on speculative delusions and promises of easy profits. “The Greatest Thought Experiment of Our Lifetime” King began his critique by acknowledging Bitcoin’s conceptual ingenuity, calling it “the greatest thought experiment of our lifetime.” He highlighted its significance in showcasing how easily greed can manipulate human behavior. According to King, Bitcoin’s rise is a testament to the susceptibility of individuals to promises of quick wealth, often clouding rational judgment. From Online Gambling to Global Speculation In his post, King traced Bitcoin’s origins, arguing that it began as a niche tool for internet poker players seeking anonymity. Over time, however, he believes it has morphed into something far more concerning: A “Malignant Grift” King described Bitcoin as a predatory system, exploiting the hopes of everyday investors drawn by tales of astronomical returns. Speculative Frenzy He suggested that Bitcoin’s value is propped up not by utility but by “delusional speculators” who invest based on the fear of missing out (FOMO). A Dangerous Game Comparing the cryptocurrency market to a game of musical chairs, King warned that when the music stops, many will be left facing significant losses. Is Bitcoin Truly Useless? While King’s critique is scathing, it raises questions about Bitcoin’s true value and utility. Let’s examine some arguments for and against his claim: Arguments Supporting King’s Critique Lack of Intrinsic Value : Bitcoin does not generate cash flow like stocks or provide utility like commodities, leading critics to question its inherent worth. Energy Consumption : Bitcoin’s proof-of-work mining mechanism consumes vast amounts of electricity, leading to environmental concerns. Speculative Nature : Critics argue that Bitcoin’s value is driven more by hype than by tangible use cases. Counterarguments Digital Gold : Proponents liken Bitcoin to gold—a store of value rather than a traditional asset. Decentralization : Bitcoin offers an alternative to centralized financial systems, empowering users with greater control over their assets. Global Utility : In regions with unstable economies or restrictive monetary policies, Bitcoin provides a lifeline for transferring and preserving wealth. Bitcoin: A “Malignant Grift” or Revolutionary Technology? The label of “malignant grift” used by King is especially provocative. It suggests not only deception but also harm inflicted on those who invest. Yet, many argue that Bitcoin has achieved groundbreaking milestones: First Decentralized Cryptocurrency : Bitcoin introduced blockchain technology, inspiring thousands of other projects. Financial Inclusion : For unbanked populations, Bitcoin offers a means to participate in the global economy. Institutional Adoption : Despite criticisms, major companies and financial institutions have integrated Bitcoin into their portfolios and payment systems. The Risk of Speculative Bubbles King’s warning about Bitcoin being a “giant game of musical chairs” touches on a legitimate concern: market bubbles. Historically, speculative bubbles are characterized by: Overvaluation : Prices rise far beyond an asset’s fundamental value. FOMO : Investors pile in, fearing they’ll miss out on gains. Inevitable Collapse : When confidence wanes, prices plummet, leaving many with significant losses. Bitcoin’s meteoric rise and occasional sharp declines fit this pattern, fueling skepticism from analysts like King. Community Reactions to King’s Criticism King’s post on X has sparked heated discussions across the crypto community: Supporters of King’s View : Critics of Bitcoin have praised King for calling out what they see as fundamental flaws in the cryptocurrency. Bitcoin Advocates : Proponents have countered his claims, arguing that Bitcoin’s decentralized nature and adoption potential far outweigh its speculative risks. Conclusion Jacob King’s declaration that Bitcoin is “utterly useless” has reignited debates about the cryptocurrency’s true value and purpose. While his criticisms highlight undeniable risks associated with speculative behavior and environmental impact, Bitcoin’s supporters argue that its revolutionary technology and potential for financial inclusion are too significant to ignore. As Bitcoin continues to evolve, its utility, adoption, and market dynamics will remain central to discussions about its role in the global financial landscape. For investors and observers alike, King’s critique serves as a reminder to approach the cryptocurrency market with caution, critical thinking, and a clear understanding of risks. 뉴스제목: Luxor COO Skeptical About Trump’s Promise to Mine All Remaining Bitcoin in the U.S.
본문: Luxor COO Skeptical About Trump’s Promise to Mine All Remaining Bitcoin in the U.S. Ethan Vera, Chief Operating Officer of Luxor Technologies, has raised concerns about President-elect Donald Trump’s ambitious promise to localize all remaining Bitcoin mining operations within the United States. Vera’s skepticism stems from the global distribution of mining power, where U.S.-based miners currently account for less than 50%, facing stiff competition from major mining hubs like China and Russia. Trump’s Vision for Bitcoin Mining in the U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has pledged to make the United States a dominant player in the Bitcoin mining industry. His plan involves localizing all remaining Bitcoin mining operations to strengthen the country’s position in the crypto space and ensure energy security while reducing reliance on foreign entities. This promise aligns with Trump’s broader agenda of “America First,” focusing on economic independence and technological leadership. However, such a bold commitment raises questions about its feasibility and the challenges involved. Why Luxor’s Ethan Vera Is Skeptical Ethan Vera, whose company Luxor Technologies specializes in Bitcoin mining and related services, outlined several key obstacles to achieving Trump’s goal: 1. Current Share of Mining Power U.S.-based Bitcoin miners control less than 50% of the global mining hash rate, with significant portions dominated by China, Russia, and other countries. This imbalance highlights the difficulty of centralizing mining operations solely within the U.S. 2. International Competition China : Despite regulatory crackdowns, China remains a key player due to its access to cheap hardware and energy. Russia : Benefiting from abundant natural resources, Russia has emerged as another major mining hub, leveraging its cold climate and inexpensive electricity. Emerging Markets : Countries in Central Asia and South America are also gaining traction, offering low-cost energy and favorable regulatory environments. 3. Infrastructure Challenges Scaling up Bitcoin mining in the U.S. requires significant investment in infrastructure, including data centers, power generation facilities, and advanced cooling systems. These demands could strain existing energy grids and face resistance from local communities concerned about environmental impacts. 4. Energy Consumption and Sustainability Bitcoin mining is energy-intensive, consuming vast amounts of electricity. Balancing Trump’s localization promise with sustainable energy practices presents another challenge, particularly given the growing emphasis on reducing carbon footprints. U.S. Bitcoin Mining Landscape The U.S. has made notable strides in Bitcoin mining, particularly following China’s crackdown on crypto activities in 2021. States like Texas, Wyoming, and Kentucky have emerged as mining hotspots due to their crypto-friendly policies and access to affordable energy. Advantages for U.S. Miners Stable Regulatory Environment : The U.S. offers greater legal clarity compared to many competitors. Access to Capital : American mining firms benefit from a well-developed financial ecosystem, allowing them to raise funds more easily. Innovation : Companies in the U.S. are at the forefront of developing efficient mining technologies and exploring renewable energy solutions. Remaining Challenges Despite these advantages, the U.S. must contend with high energy costs in some regions, logistical barriers, and competition for mining equipment. Global Competition: The Reality Check Trump’s plan to localize Bitcoin mining must contend with the decentralized and competitive nature of the global mining industry. China’s Mining Comeback Although China officially banned crypto mining in 2021, reports indicate a resurgence in underground operations. Chinese miners still access low-cost hardware and hydroelectric power during rainy seasons, maintaining their influence. Russia’s Expanding Hash Rate Russia’s colder climate and cheap electricity make it an attractive location for mining farms. The government has also expressed interest in regulating and supporting the industry, positioning itself as a competitor to U.S. dominance. Diversifying Geographies Countries like Kazakhstan, El Salvador, and Canada are investing in mining infrastructure, providing further diversification to the global mining network. Feasibility of Localizing Bitcoin Mining in the U.S. Trump’s pledge to localize Bitcoin mining raises important questions: Is Full Localization Achievable? Given the global nature of Bitcoin mining, achieving complete localization in the U.S. may be impractical. Instead, policies could focus on increasing the U.S. share of mining power while collaborating with global partners. How to Address Energy Concerns? Promoting renewable energy adoption in mining could align Trump’s vision with sustainability goals, making it more palatable to regulators and environmental advocates. Will It Require Policy Overhauls? Achieving significant progress may require incentives such as tax breaks, grants for renewable energy projects, and easing restrictions on industrial-scale mining operations. Conclusion Ethan Vera’s skepticism about Trump’s promise to centralize all Bitcoin mining operations in the U.S. underscores the complexity of the cryptocurrency mining landscape. While the U.S. has the potential to expand its influence in the sector, achieving full localization faces significant challenges, including global competition, infrastructure demands, and energy concerns. Trump’s vision, though ambitious, could serve as a catalyst for greater investment and innovation in the U.S. crypto mining industry. By addressing these challenges strategically, the U.S. might not only increase its share of Bitcoin mining but also set global standards for sustainable and efficient mining practices. 뉴스제목: USDT Transaction Volume on TRON Sees Significant Growth
본문: USDT Transaction Volume on TRON Sees Significant Growth The TRON Network has seen a remarkable surge in USDT (Tether) transaction volume, with the average transaction size more than doubling over the past 18 months. According to data from CryptoQuant contributor and market analyst Maartunn, the average USDT transaction size rose from $4,273 in June 2023 to $9,718 in December 2024 . This trend highlights increased activity from larger market participants, suggesting growing trust and adoption of the TRON blockchain. The Rise of USDT on TRON TRON has become one of the most prominent platforms for Tether transactions, rivaling Ethereum in terms of transaction volume and efficiency. The network’s low fees and high throughput make it an attractive choice for both retail and institutional users, fueling its growth as a major player in the stablecoin ecosystem. Key Milestones Increased Transaction Size : The doubling of average transaction size signals a shift towards larger transactions, potentially reflecting adoption by institutional investors and high-net-worth individuals. Dominance in Stablecoin Transfers : TRON now processes a significant portion of global USDT transfers, thanks to its efficient infrastructure. Why TRON Is Gaining Momentum The TRON Network’s growth in USDT transaction volume can be attributed to several key factors: 1. Low Transaction Fees TRON offers negligible fees compared to Ethereum, making it an appealing option for large transactions. This cost efficiency is particularly important for high-frequency and high-value transactions. 2. High Transaction Speed With the ability to process thousands of transactions per second, TRON provides a seamless experience for users who require fast and reliable transfers. 3. Institutional Adoption The increase in average transaction size suggests that institutional players, such as hedge funds, trading firms, and high-net-worth individuals, are embracing TRON for their USDT transactions. 4. Growing Trust in TRON As stablecoin adoption continues to grow, TRON’s consistent performance and secure network have contributed to increased trust among market participants. The Role of USDT in Crypto Markets Tether (USDT) remains the most widely used stablecoin, serving as a critical liquidity tool in the cryptocurrency market. Its role as a stable, dollar-pegged asset makes it a preferred choice for traders and institutions alike. USDT on TRON vs. Ethereum Cost : TRON’s minimal fees offer a clear advantage over Ethereum’s sometimes unpredictable gas fees. Adoption : While Ethereum remains a hub for DeFi and NFTs, TRON’s focus on stablecoin transactions gives it an edge in this specific niche. Institutional Use Cases Larger USDT transaction sizes on TRON may reflect its increasing use for: Cross-border payments Arbitrage trading Settlement of large trades on centralized and decentralized exchanges Insights from CryptoQuant’s Maartunn Maartunn, a CryptoQuant contributor, emphasized that the growth in USDT transaction volume on TRON aligns with broader market trends, including the rising adoption of stablecoins for institutional purposes. The data suggests a shift from retail-driven activity to transactions dominated by larger players, reinforcing the narrative of maturing crypto markets. What Does This Mean for TRON? The surge in USDT transaction volume positions TRON as a leading blockchain for stablecoin transactions. Its ability to attract larger market participants bodes well for its long-term adoption and competitiveness. Potential Impacts Enhanced Market Position : TRON could further solidify its role as the go-to platform for stablecoin transfers. Ecosystem Growth : Increased activity may attract more developers and projects to the TRON ecosystem. Increased Competition : Other networks, such as Ethereum Layer 2 solutions, may need to innovate to compete with TRON’s cost and efficiency advantages. Challenges Ahead Despite its growth, TRON faces challenges that could impact its trajectory: Regulatory Scrutiny : Stablecoins like USDT are under increased regulatory focus, which could affect their adoption across platforms. Competition : Networks such as Solana, Avalanche, and Ethereum Layer 2 solutions continue to evolve, offering alternatives to TRON. Scalability Demands : As transaction volume grows, TRON must ensure its network remains scalable and efficient. Conclusion The doubling of USDT’s average transaction size on the TRON Network reflects its growing appeal among larger market participants, including institutions and high-net-worth individuals. With low fees, high transaction speeds, and robust infrastructure, TRON has established itself as a major player in the stablecoin ecosystem. As the cryptocurrency market matures, TRON’s continued success will depend on its ability to address challenges while capitalizing on the increasing adoption of stablecoins. The network’s rise is a testament to the evolving dynamics of the blockchain industry and the critical role that stablecoins like USDT play in global finance. 뉴스제목: Cambodia’s Central Bank Greenlights Stablecoins and Backed Coins, Excludes Bitcoin
본문: The National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) has permitted commercial banks and payment institutions to offer services involving Category 1 crypto assets, such as backed or stable cryptocurrencies. This marks the first time the NBC has approved such services, as outlined in a directive issued on December 26 and announced on December 27, according to a report by the Phnom Penh Post . However, unbacked cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin remain prohibited. Cambodia Aims to Regulate Digital Currencies The directive seeks to regulate operations involving digital currencies, reflecting Cambodia’s efforts to align with global financial trends. Under the new rules, institutions must obtain prior approval from NBC to engage in activities such as exchanging crypto assets for fiat currencies, transferring crypto assets between accounts, and offering custody services. Notably, these institutions are barred from utilizing customers’ crypto assets for their own purposes. Historically, Cambodia has maintained a strict stance against cryptocurrencies, citing risks like fraud, money laundering, and illicit activities, which have previously led to a ban on trading and transactions. Economic researcher Hong Vanak of the Royal Academy of Cambodia told the Phnom Penh Post that the growing global use of cryptocurrencies alongside their decentralized nature complicates regulation, taxation, and tracking. Vanak argued that cryptocurrencies provide limited benefits to Cambodia’s economy but suggested that banks and institutions offering crypto-related services could generate revenue through user fees. Cambodia Blocks Access to 16 Crypto Exchanges Earlier this month, Cambodia blocked access to 16 cryptocurrency exchange websites, including major platforms like Binance, Coinbase, and OKX, as part of its ongoing effort to regulate the digital asset market. The action followed a directive signed by acting TRC chairman Srun Kimsann, which restricted access to 102 domains, primarily targeting online gambling sites. Crypto exchange websites were included in the crackdown due to their lack of licensing from the Securities and Exchange Regulator of Cambodia (SERC). While website access has been restricted, mobile applications for these platforms remain available. Currently, only two companies have licenses under SERC’s “FinTech Regulatory Sandbox” program. These entities can trade digital assets but are prohibited from exchanging cryptocurrencies for Cambodia’s legal tender or other fiat currencies. Cambodia's National Bank Authorises Crypto Transactions For Commercial Banks https://t.co/IAS7KHrmpq — B2B Cambodia (@B2BMedia_Cambo) December 27, 2024 Despite these measures, Cambodia remains a global leader in retail crypto use per capita, according to analytics firm Chainalysis. Centralized exchanges account for 70% of crypto transactions in the country. However, the country faces scrutiny for crypto-related criminal activities. The UN Office of Drugs and Crime reported that criminal organizations in Cambodia use cryptocurrencies for money laundering and dark-web transactions. Chainalysis identified over $49 billion in crypto transactions between 2021 and mid-2024 facilitated by Huione Guarantee, a marketplace within the Cambodian conglomerate Huione Group. The post Cambodia’s Central Bank Greenlights Stablecoins and Backed Coins, Excludes Bitcoin appeared first on Cryptonews .

뉴스제목: BTC Yet to Enter Bubble Phase, Says CryptoQuant CEO: Key Insights into the Bull Run
본문: BTC Yet to Enter Bubble Phase, Says CryptoQuant CEO: Key Insights into the Bull Run Bitcoin (BTC) remains in a bull run and is far from entering a bubble phase, according to Ki Young Ju , CEO of on-chain analytics platform CryptoQuant. Writing on X (formerly Twitter), Ju highlighted that the current market dynamic shows whales dominating Bitcoin accumulation while retail investors are stepping back. On-chain data reveals $7 billion in weekly capital inflows , a clear indicator of robust market activity and sustained upward momentum. Bitcoin’s Current Market Dynamics Ju pointed out a critical shift in market behavior: Whale Dominance : Large-scale investors, or whales, are accumulating Bitcoin at a pace that no longer surprises the market, unlike in previous cycles. Retail Pullback : Retail investors appear less active, creating a market environment dominated by institutional and high-net-worth players. This dynamic is a departure from earlier bull runs, where retail enthusiasm often drove speculative bubbles. Why Bitcoin Is Not in a Bubble Phase The CryptoQuant CEO explained that the current bull market has not yet entered the exuberant “bubble phase” typically marked by unsustainable price surges and widespread retail FOMO (fear of missing out). Key Indicators Supporting This View Sustained Capital Inflows On-chain data shows $7 billion flowing into the Bitcoin market weekly , providing a stable foundation for price growth. Unlike speculative bubbles, this inflow is primarily driven by informed investors. Controlled Volatility While short-term corrections are possible, Ju predicts these will be limited to less than 30%. Even if such dips occur, they are likely to be followed by rapid recoveries, indicating strong support levels. Cycle Top Not Reached Ju emphasized that Bitcoin’s price has not yet approached the euphoric peaks typically seen at the top of bull cycles. He dismissed bearish predictions, asserting that those forecasting a bear run are ignoring the on-chain data. Comparison with Past Bull Runs Bitcoin’s behavior in 2024 differs from previous cycles in notable ways: Cycle Key Driver Retail Involvement Bubble Phase Indicators 2017 ICO boom, retail speculation High Extreme price surges, FOMO 2021 Institutional adoption, DeFi Moderate NFT mania, overleveraged positions 2024 Whale accumulation, macro trends Low None yet observed The absence of bubble-like behavior in the current cycle reflects a maturing market, with capital inflows primarily from experienced investors and institutions. Short-Term Correction vs. Long-Term Growth Ju cautioned that a short-term correction is possible but unlikely to derail the bull market. Corrections during bull runs are often temporary, offering opportunities for further accumulation. Potential Scenarios Short-Term Dip A correction of up to 30% could occur, driven by profit-taking or macroeconomic factors. Ju predicts such dips would be short-lived, as strong demand would quickly push prices higher. Post-Correction Surge Following any dip, Bitcoin could rebound with gains exceeding 30%, fueled by renewed investor confidence and continued inflows. Cycle Top Still Distant On-chain data suggests the top of this Bitcoin cycle remains far off, leaving room for significant price appreciation. The Role of On-Chain Data in Market Predictions Ju’s analysis emphasizes the importance of on-chain metrics in understanding market trends: Capital Inflows : Measure the strength of demand for Bitcoin. Whale Accumulation : Tracks large investor activity, often a precursor to price stability or growth. Retail Activity : Gauges speculative behavior, which can signal bubble formation. By focusing on these indicators, CryptoQuant provides a data-driven perspective that contrasts with speculative narratives often seen in the market. What This Means for Investors For Bitcoin traders and investors, Ju’s insights offer a roadmap for navigating the current market: Patience Is Key : The absence of a bubble phase suggests there is still room for long-term growth. Opportunities in Corrections : Short-term dips could present buying opportunities for those confident in the bull run. Data-Driven Decisions : On-chain data provides valuable insights into market health and trends, reducing reliance on speculation. Conclusion CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju’s analysis provides a compelling argument that Bitcoin remains in a strong bull cycle, with no signs of entering a speculative bubble. The dominance of whales, coupled with sustained capital inflows, underpins a market that is maturing and stabilizing. While short-term corrections may occur, the long-term outlook for Bitcoin remains optimistic, with significant potential for growth as the cycle progresses. Investors would do well to stay informed, relying on on-chain data and market trends to guide their decisions. 뉴스제목: Binance’s Bitcoin Taker Buy Volume Hits $8.3 Billion: What It Means for the Market
본문: Bitcoin (BTC) has been struggling below the $100,000 mark despite a modest 2% surge over the past day. However, a popular trading metric used to gauge buyer interest in Binance suggests that the cryptocurrency could revisit this crucial price level before the end of the year. Strengthening Buying Pressure on Binance Over the past 60 days, Binance’s Bitcoin Taker Buy Volume has reached $8.3 billion and formed three higher lows, indicative of strengthening buying pressure. This metric, which measures the total volume of buy transactions executed by market participants at current order book prices, reflects increasing investor interest in Bitcoin. According to CryptoQuant’s analysis , the rise in Taker Buy Volume on Binance has been steady despite occasional market corrections. This growing buying pressure often correlates with potential price increases, as it indicates that buyers are actively consuming available liquidity at market prices. While the market may appear overheated, the persistence of this trend points to a possible upward price movement in the near term. Meanwhile, Bitcoin reserves on Binance have reached their lowest levels since early 2024, following a decline that started in August. This mirrors January’s low, which preceded a 90% rally in BTC’s price. Coupled with a 40,000 BTC drop in OTC desk inventories since November, this trend could potentially indicate rising demand and investor confidence ahead of a much-anticipated bullish reversal. Bitcoin’s Next Move Bitcoin has remained below the $100,000 mark since December 19, following its initial breakthrough on December 5. With its current value hovering around $96,000, the crypto asset has dropped over 12% from its record high of $108,300 reached on December 17. However, several experts foresee a bullish breakout. The pseudonymous “xoom,” for one, recently highlighted a bullish engulfing candle with rising volume, indicating a potential price target of $110K to $130K by January’s end, with $120K as a realistic target. Despite possible short-term volatility, the trend suggests BTC could climb to $135K or higher in the coming months. Another pseudonymous crypto analyst, “Titan of Crypto,” said that Bitcoin’s current price action appears to be similar to the correction fractal from late 2023. Interestingly, 2024’s movements are roughly three weeks ahead in the timeline. While the analyst does not guarantee the same scenario will unfold, the similarities highlight potential bullish momentum, as the cryptocurrency may replicate its previous trajectory and break toward new highs if the pattern persists. As the meme segment experiences a rise in buying pressure, Dogecoin is back in action.With a 13% increase over the past 7 days, Dogecoin's market cap now stands at $47.15 billion. With a year-end rally looking increasingly likely, will Dogecoin stage a breakout?DOGE Price AnalysisOn the 4-hour chart, Dogecoin's price action shows a gradual increase in bearish influence. The lower-high formation following a failed attempt to break above $0.4842 has kept Dogecoin under the resistance of a trendline. This has led to three bearish reversals. Additionally, the correction phase has resulted in a death cross between the 50- and 200-period SMAs and a bearish crossover between the 100- and 200-period SMAs. This alignment of the SMAs is bearish on the 4-hour chart.After the death cross, the 50-SMA continues to act as dynamic resistance, keeping Dogecoin's price under bearish control. Currently, Dogecoin is trading within a consolidation range between the 23.60% and 38.20% Fibonacci levels.Meanwhile, the crucial support zone at $0.30, along with the 23.60% Fibonacci level, acts as a cushion. Dogecoin is currently priced at $0.3202, forming a bullish engulfing candle, marking a 2.90% increase in the past 4 hours. This recovery counters the 6.48% drop from the previous night, which had formed a bearish engulfing daily candle.Dogecoin Price TargetsAs the intraday recovery gains momentum, Dogecoin is hinting at a potential breakout above the 50-SMA line. This would increase the likelihood of Dogecoin closing above the long-standing resistance trendline.Further supporting the chances of a breakout rally, the 4-hour RSI shows a bullish divergence between the last two bottom formations within the consolidation range.If this breakout occurs, the next target will likely be the 200-SMA line, corresponding to the 61.80% Fibonacci level at $0.3913. On the other hand, if Dogecoin closes below the psychological $0.30 mark, it could test the immediate support zone at $0.2664.

뉴스제목: Today in Bitcoin and Ethereum! A Historic $18 Billion Moment Will Happen! What Does It Signal for BTC and ETH Prices?
본문: Bitcoin (BTC) is preparing to leave behind a year full of rises under the influence of Donald Trump. Bitcoin broke records one after another in 2024 and exceeded $100,000 for the first time in its history. However, while Bitcoin has been exhibiting volatile movements in recent days, the Bitcoin and cryptocurrency market is approaching the last days of 2024 with the largest option maturity in history. Like every Friday, today is the expiration date for option contracts in the crypto market. These options are of even greater importance as they fall on the last Friday of December, the last quarter of the year 2024. According to Deribit data, a total of $18 billion worth of Bitcoin and Ethereum option contracts will expire today. Accordingly, the Put/Call Ratio of BTC options is 0.69, the maximum loss point is $85,000 and the notional value is $14.38 billion. When we look at Ethereum, ETH options have a Put/Call Ratio of 0.41, a maximum loss point of $3,000, and a notional value of $3.7 billion. Deribit CEO Luuk Strijers said: “The previously dominant bullish momentum in Bitcoin has stalled, leaving the market heavily leveraged to the upside. This increases the risk of a rapid snowball effect if a significant downside move occurs. All eyes are on this deadline because it has the potential to determine what the narrative in Bitcoin will be as we head into the new year.” What Does the Put/Call Ratio Signal for Bitcoin and Ethereum? The put/call ratio is calculated by dividing the number of put options by the number of call options. A ratio below 1 means there are more buys than puts, indicating an uptrend. A ratio above 1 means there are more puts than calls, indicating a downtrend. A ratio close to 1 means the market is balanced or neutral. For Bitcoin, this ratio is 0.69; for Ethereum, it is 0.41. Accordingly, these ratios theoretically indicate an upward trend for BTC and ETH. However, time will tell how these ratios will affect the price. At this point, do not make your investment decisions based on a single data or report. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Today in Bitcoin and Ethereum! A Historic $18 Billion Moment Will Happen! What Does It Signal for BTC and ETH Prices?
